SELECT rm.*, mb.name AS brand_name, mm.name AS model_name, mv.name AS version_name, mbv.name AS base_version_name FROM t_model_ref rm LEFT JOIN t_mobile_brand mb ON mb.id = rm.brand_id LEFT JOIN t_mobile_model mm ON mm.id = rm.model_id LEFT JOIN t_mobile_version mv ON mv.id = rm.version_id LEFT JOIN t_mobile_base_version mbv ON mbv.id = rm.base_version_id WHERE ref_id = #{id} and rm.type = #{type}
ORDER BY rm.${sortName} ${sortDir}

SELECT mb.id AS brand_id, mb.`name` AS brand_name, mm.id AS model_id, mm.`name` AS model_name, mv.id AS version_id, mv.`name` AS version_name, mbv.id AS base_version_id, mbv.`name` AS base_version_name FROM t_mobile_brand mb LEFT JOIN t_mobile_model mm ON mm.brand_id = mb.id LEFT JOIN t_mobile_version mv ON mv.model_id = mm.id LEFT JOIN t_mobile_base_version mbv ON mbv.version_id = mv.id
